column2: Create a custom, titular empire. It will retain your current coat of arms (flag) and have a similar map color as your current primary kingdom title, among other dynamically-derived properties relating to your present primary title.

Create a custom, titular kingdom. It will retain your current coat of arms (flag) and have a similar map color as your current primary duchy title, among other dynamically-derived properties relating to your present primary title.
Reclaim Charlemagne's legacy as the protector of Rome and found the Holy Roman Empire.
Reclaim Charlemagne's legacy as the protector of Rome and found the Saint-Empire Romain, a western/frankish/latin-centric alternative HRE.
Restore the Byzantine Empire. The Roman Empire shall not be forgotten by history!

These are dark times. It is true, and I weep for the realm for its truth: the Empire has been broken. I can no longer foolishly claim the title. To do so would be comedy at best and sacrilege at worst...
Religion is Orthodox, Bogomilist, Monothelite, or Iconoclast\n
Religion is Nestorian, Messalian, Apostolic, Paulician, Tondrakian, Miaphysite, Monophysite, or Maronite\n
All counties within §YConstantinople§!'s de jure kingdom, §Y[This.GetBaseName]§!, are under §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!\n
Completely controls §YConstantinople§! and its holdings, besides §YHagia Sophia§!\n
§YHagia Sophia§!: Within the realm of §Y[Root.GetBestName]§! OR, if [Root.GetPossPronoun] religion is Orthodox, held by the §YEcumenical Patriarchate§!\n
